mapper.select: SELECT si.STUDENT_SEQ_ID, si.STUDENT_NAME, si.STUDENT_ID, si.DORMITORY_ID, b.BOARD_SEQ_ID, b.BOARD_TITLE, b.BOARD_BODY, f.FILE_SEQ_ID, f.FILE_PATH, f.FILE_UPLOAD_DT, f.FILE_TITLE FROM STUDENT_INFO si INNER JOIN BOARD b ON si.STUDENT_SEQ_ID = b.STUDENT_SEQ_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN FILE f ON b.BOARD_SEQ_ID = f.BOARD_SEQ_ID ORDER BY b.BOARD_SEQ_ID LIMIT #{pageNo,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{pageSize,jdbcType=NUMERIC}

SELECT si.STUDENT_SEQ_ID, si.STUDENT_NAME, si.STUDENT_ID, si.DORMITORY_ID, b.BOARD_SEQ_ID, b.BOARD_TITLE, b.BOARD_BODY, f.FILE_SEQ_ID, f.FILE_PATH, f.FILE_UPLOAD_DT, f.FILE_TITLE FROM STUDENT_INFO si INNER JOIN BOARD b ON si.STUDENT_SEQ_ID = b.STUDENT_SEQ_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN FILE f ON b.BOARD_SEQ_ID = f.BOARD_SEQ_ID WHERE b.BOARD_SEQ_ID = #{boardNo} ORDER BY b.BOARD_SEQ_ID
